articles.description: The habit of adding salt to foods appears to independently predict cardiovascular problems, a new study shows.
articles.content: People who add salt to their foods are at higher risk for cardiovascular disease regardless of whether they also follow elements of a diet intended to help prevent high blood pressure according to a … [+3713 chars]
